description: Greg Galeazzi trains to become a doctor at Harvard Medical School after a 2011 roadside bomb in Afghanistan tore off both his legs and much of his right arm.
maintext: Greg Galeazzi trains to become a doctor at Harvard Medical School after a 2011 roadside bomb in Afghanistan tore off both his legs and much of his right arm.
title: Army vet comes back from massive bomb injuries to start Harvard Medical School
